title: Welcome to FitScore LEGAL™
subtitle: Our candidate evaluation system provides dynamic analysis of Performance, Energy, and Culture, with automatic notifications and real-time results. Streamline your recruitment process in a transparent and efficient way.
footer: FitScore LEGAL™ — Making the recruitment process more transparent and efficient for your company.

dynamicEvaluation.title: Dynamic Evaluation
dynamicEvaluation.description: Receive a complete FitScore based on Performance, Energy, and Culture for each candidate.

notifications.title: Automatic Notifications
notifications.description: Instant alerts about candidate results to keep the process up to date.

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.description: Create your account or log in if you already have one and start evaluating candidates.
